home.presentation: Hello! My name is Samuel Rojas.
home.description: I'm a web designer and mobile developer that build responsive websites and development cross-platform Apps.

myWeb.resume: A website that is a Single-page application(SPA). With a high-performance, responsive website that uses powered animations. As also, uses the creative SVG's power for enriching user experience.

traumApp.resume: A cross-platform App, builded with React Native, an application capable of generating informes medicos de forma automatizada. Besides, enrich user experience thanks to its comfortable interface.

knowlegde.firstDsc: I’m very familiar using web tecnhologies like HTML5, CCS3 and JavaScript. and also I have used frameworks such as Angular and React.
knowlegde.secondDsc: I have experience using ES6, ES7 and TypeScript, also I have experience building responsive websites with a high-performance.
knowlegde.thirdDsc: Otherwise, I’m familiar using the framework React Native for building across-platform Apps.
knowlegde.quarterDsc: However, In the back-end I have used PHP and Java, using both SQL and NoSQL databases. Such as MySQL, PostgreSQL, MongoDB, Realm and Firebase.

about.resume:
I'm a Venezuelan web designer and a mobile developer
I really like to create useful and intuitive products with comfortable visual interfaces for everybody.
about.intro:
My name is Samuel
I'm a Venezuelan web designer and a mobile developer currently studying systems engineering in Caracas, Venezuela.
about.whatILike: I really like to make useful and intuitive products with comfortable visual interfaces for anyone. I like to analyze the user context in order to create the best solution on each project. I have experience making cross-platform applications and working as front-end developer in some projects. as well, I have builded responsive websites.
